mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.permission FROM sys_user su JOIN sys_users_roles sur ON su.user_id = sur.user_id JOIN sys_role sr ON sur.role_id = sr.role_id JOIN sys_roles_menus srm ON sr.role_id = srm.role_id JOIN sys_menu sm ON srm.menu_id = sm.menu_id WHERE su.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.permission IS NOT NULL AND sm.permission != ''
